version_description:
This Halloween, gear up for the Midnight Circuit!
Quickshift Cam is here to offer you 4 weekly challenges of one track and bike each, to pit yourself against every other rider in the world. Impress her with your performance and smash trophies to win rewards like new Tracks & rad Outfits (even some that you’ve missed before).
Make your opponents eat dirt with your techniques and speed to the top of a brand new leaderboard every week!
Have a frightfully fun Halloween and keep riding!

This Halloween, gear up for the Midnight Circuit!
Quickshift Cam is here to offer you 4 weekly challenges of one track and bike each, to pit yourself against every other rider in the world. Impress her with your performance and smash trophies to win rewards like new Tracks & rad Outfits (even some that you’ve missed before).
Make your opponents eat dirt with your techniques and speed to the top of a brand new leaderboard every week!
Have a frightfully fun Halloween and keep riding!

This Halloween, gear up for the Midnight Circuit!
Quickshift Cam is here to offer you 4 weekly challenges of one track and bike each, to pit yourself against every other rider in the world. Impress her with your performance and smash trophies to win rewards like new Tracks & rad Outfits (even some that you’ve missed before).
Make your opponents eat dirt with your techniques and speed to the top of a brand new leaderboard every week!
Have a frightfully fun Halloween and keep riding!

While you’ve been out conquering the frontier, we continued to polish the game:
• Uplay got better! It’s now easier to connect, invite and play with friends. Share more gifts and compete against them on global leaderboards!
• An optimized in-game support tool, for when you want to reach out to us and share your feedback.
Grab the update and ride on!

How many KTM lovers out there? Something more legendary is on its way...

Introducing the KTM Rally Challenge – the ultimate test of skill!
Ride the all new legendary KTM 450 Rally through 4 weekly legs of 10 tracks each and bring glory to your new team, the Desert Wings! Race hard on every track to score your best time & dominate the weekly leaderboards! Win grand rewards based on your performance including blueprints to the KTM 450 Rally and 8 radical new tracks!

Ready to Race?

Introducing the KTM Rally Challenge – the ultimate test of skill!
Ride the all new legendary KTM 450 Rally through 4 weekly legs of 10 tracks each and bring glory to your new team, the Desert Wings! Race hard on every track to score your best time & dominate the weekly leaderboards! Win grand rewards based on your performance including blueprints to the KTM 450 Rally and 8 radical new tracks!

Ready to Race?

How fast did you race in the KTM Rally Challenge?

It's time to update your game for a smoother ride - we've improved the stability and removed some pesky bugs to enhance your gameplay experience!

Reach out to us on our Forums if you have any concerns, and do share your feedback!

Frontier completes THREE YEARS! Join in the celebration, Riders!
It’s time for you to gear up your sleeves. We’re introducing the ‘Bandito’, a new bike with special speed techniques to blow your mind! Get your hands on it, while you ride in your favorite event, the Midnight Circuit!

Harder, faster and stronger than before – we’re working permanently to improve your riding experience. We’ve eradicated some annoying bugs hitting the Frontier.
Download the latest version now!

Harder, faster and stronger than before – we’re working permanently to improve your riding experience. We’ve eradicated some annoying bugs hitting the Frontier.
Download the latest version now!

Easter has passed, but a bizarre new visitor, claiming to be the Easter Bunny, roams the Frontier. Is he the real Easter Bunny? Can he be trusted? What does he want?
With this update, we’ll have some egg-citing shells to crack!

Ride across the Frontier & locate Easter Eggs to win up to 7 Brand New Tracks! All this, plus a Special Outfit & Paintjob!

Grab your riding gear, we’re about to hit the road and discover the secret behind the mysterious Easter Bunny & the EASTER EGG HUNT!
We regularly bring you updates and new features to improve your experience. Have fun!

Riders, we have a blazin' new event this update! Gear up for the BANDITO RALLY CHALLENGE!
Get your hands on the new Tier I Speed Bike: The Bandito, and ride through 3 weekly legs of 10 tracks each! Score your best time & dominate the weekly leaderboards to win GRAND REWARDS!

Better, faster and stronger than before – we’re working permanently to improve your riding experience. We’ve wiped out some annoying bugs hitting the Frontier.
Download the latest version now!

Ms Norkana, a headstrong politician with a devious plan has arrived in the Frontier. She’s determined to soil your reputation as the best rider and prove herself as a worthy leader. Her challenge: Survive her literal trial by fire, earn reputation with slick tricks and avoid her onslaught of fireballs launched at the Rider, or surrender yourself to her service.

Defend your reputation, uncover a dangerous plot, perform sweet stunts and save the Frontier and its citizens!

Harder, faster and stronger than before – we’re working permanently to improve your riding experience. Based on your feedback, we’ve been able to remove some annoying bugs hitting the Frontier.
Download the latest version now!

Harder, faster and stronger than before – we’re working permanently to improve your riding experience. Based on your feedback, we’ve been able to remove some annoying bugs hitting the Frontier.
Download the latest version now!

Introducing the BMW Rally Challenge – where speed meets skill! Discover the legend of the glorious BMW F 800 GS as you race through 4 weekly legs of 10 tracks each!

Blaze through every track to score your best time & dominate the weekly leaderboards! Win bangin’ rewards including blueprints to the BMW F 800 GS and 5 wicked new tracks!

Ride the Beast!

Monster Energy AUS X OPEN 2017 - the biggest Supercross, Freestyle Motocross, and action sports event in the Southern Hemisphere comes to Trials Frontier!

Update your game and enter the ‘AUS-X OPEN Midnight Circuit’ for two weeks of super-competitive racing, with two exciting new themed Tracks and Bike Paintjobs!

Race now!

A grand adventure begins! DAKAR 2018 - the biggest Rally-Raid in the World comes to Trials Frontier!

Join the 'DAKAR Rally Challenge' for 6 Legs of super-competitive racing, with 11 exciting new Tracks to be won!

Race against multiple opponents, score the best times, and win exciting rewards!

A grand adventure begins! DAKAR 2018 - the biggest Rally-Raid in the World comes to Trials Frontier!

Join the 'DAKAR Rally Challenge' for 6 Legs of super-competitive racing, with 11 exciting new Tracks to be won!

Race against multiple opponents, score the best times, and win exciting rewards!

Riders, all aboard the Love Express! Deliver Love for Ted across the Frontier in this charming new update!
Avoid bumpy rides, and make your way to the top of the Leaderboards!
Remember, gentle and caring rides could win you 7 epic new Tracks!

We've also added support for iPhone X!

Riders, all aboard the Love Express! Deliver Love for Ted across the Frontier in this charming new update!
Avoid bumpy rides, and make your way to the top of the Leaderboards!
Remember, gentle and caring rides could win you 7 epic new Tracks!

We've also added support for iPhone X!
Get our 4th Anniversary update! Download now to get the brand-new Community Track, voted for by the Trials Community! This update also includes Bug Fixes to make your rides smoother.
The 'X Games Norway Season' rides into the Frontier! Stunt your way through the multiplayer mode this super-chilled Season, and win exclusive 'X Games Norway' reward Tracks!

Enter 'X Games Minneapolis 2018' - the world’s biggest action sports event comes to Trials Frontier! Stunt all the way through this flip-tastic event to earn Fan Points, win all-new Tracks, celebrated Outfits, and Paintjobs! For the first time ever: try the exciting new Stunt 'The Superman' in all its soaring glory! Download now!

Enter 'X Games Minneapolis 2018' - the world’s biggest action sports event comes to Trials Frontier! Stunt all the way through this flip-tastic event to earn Fan Points, win all-new Tracks, celebrated Outfits, and Paintjobs! For the first time ever: try the exciting new Stunt 'The Superman' in all its soaring glory! Download now!

Update your game for a smoother ride - we've improved the stability and removed some pesky bugs to enhance your gameplay experience!

Race in the Bunker to win some epic new Tracks and Paintjob!

Update your game for a smoother ride - we've improved the stability and removed some pesky bugs to enhance your gameplay experience!

Race in the Bunker to win some epic new Tracks and Paintjob!
Get ready to get stuntin', because it's time for 'Trixmas'! Take on the never-before-seen Skill Games - try a 'Ball Run', or get past the 'Hurdles from Hell'! Are you ready for this challenge?

Riders, it's time for Giant Leaps in an all-new environment! Defy gravity with the brand new 'Moon Rover' Bike and deliver 'Helium-3 Ores' to the Research Lab! Avoid bumpy rides, make your way to the top of the Leaderboards, and win 6 epic new Tracks! Download Now!

Riders, it's time for Giant Leaps in an all-new environment! Defy gravity with the brand new 'Moon Rover' Bike and deliver 'Helium-3 Ores' to the Research Lab! Avoid bumpy rides, make your way to the top of the Leaderboards, and win 6 epic new Tracks! Download Now!

Fire up your engines, it's time for ‘Crash & Sunburn’! join the all-new event and fly high with the Superman stunt all over again! Get stuntin' to gain Fan Points and unlock 7 new Tracks, 2 New Paintjobs, and the brand new ‘Jungle Explorer’ outfit!
The mysterious Dracuul has re-appeared to haunt the Frontier! Join the 'Halloween Heat' event and help Dracuul gather Pumpkins to win 6 brand-new Tracks!

Welcome to the Harley-Davidson Rally! Introducing the mighty Harley-Davidson XG750R in Trials Frontier! Experience maximum torque as you race this beast through 50 Tracks! Go full-throttle and set your best times to dominate the Leaderboard! Rewards include blueprints to the Harley-Davidson XG750R and exciting new tracks!

Don't miss out on the Harley-Davidson Asphalt Feeder outfit and the Orange Flicker Paintjob, as you Ride this Mean Machine! Download Now!

Meet Orbie - the friendly intergalactic explorer on a mission to get back home! Time for some intergalactic favors - collect Energy Cores hidden across the Frontier and help repair Orbie's Spaceship! Join 'Orbie's Quest' to win all-new Tracks, exciting outfits and Paintjobs! Download now!

Update your game for a smoother ride - we've removed some pesky bugs to enhance your gameplay experience! Win some exciting new rewards in the upcoming PvP Season and multiplayer events! Join the ride!
Update your game for a smoother ride - we've improved the stability and removed some pesky bugs to enhance your gameplay experience!
The Frontier is Haunted! The mysterious Dracuul has appeared out of thin air, looking for his missing Pumpkins! Help him find his freaky fruits, and win exciting new Tracks! Download Now!

Join us for the biggest PvP Marathon ever in the Frontier! Zudina brings you the Tranzit Marathon with two Legs to compete in, and double the rewards! Win 'The Speedrunner' outfit and two new Tracks as rewards! Download Now!

It’s time for the Trials Holiday Run! Get into the festive spirit with Bad Bone Sr., and keep winning epic rewards throughout! Ride different bikes in each Leg, including the BMW F 800 GS and the KTM 500-EXC! Get ready to break all records in this joyful Run! Download now!

Trials Rising is in the Frontier! Master your rides or crash in style, in the upcoming Rising PvP Season! Ride hard to win exclusive, iconic rewards! Oh, and don't forget to claim the free Stuntman Antti outfit - available for a limited time only! Download Now!
